page.title: 10My House (2). My Family.
page.content: We have a cooker that cooks food,and a sink to wash cutlery.Our house is heated by central-heating and solid-fuel.We have electric and coal fires.We have 1 garage.Daddy has a lawn-mower to help him. {My Family } There are 18 people in my family. My dad travel's all over the world. He works for a paint company in Bridgnorth.My mum works for Beckbury shop and Beckbury Post Office.The Post Office is in the shop.My uncle is in the army,he has one son called Johnathan.He is my cousin and he is one.Both my Nans and Grandads are unemployed and retired.I have one sister who is ten.We live in an old house it is about twenty years old. We have one car it is a GTL Renault.
